item.title: Cybersecurity Services
item.description: Red Team Services A proactive approach to testing your organization’s resilience against advanced attacks. Our team simulates real-world threat scenarios to identify critical vulnerabilities and strengthen your systems’ defenses. Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) Harness the power of publicly available information. Our OSINT service collects, analyzes, and transforms online data into actionable intelligence to anticipate threats and protect your interests. Network Security Audits Ensure the integrity of your network infrastructures with a comprehensive audit.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi there! I’m Maximiliano, a cybersecurity enthusiast driven by the exciting challenges this field brings every day. I hold a degree in Telecommunications Engineering from the University of the Republic (UDELAR) in Uruguay, along with a Master’s in Offensive Security from Campusciberseguridad (Spain), endorsed by the Catholic University of Murcia (UCAM). Since February 2023, I’ve been an OSCP (OffSec) certified professional, a milestone that showcases my commitment to continuous learning and tackling complex security problems.
